rows.label: qst701804_msg0001
rows.name:
How's this for a sample? Has it become
a little easier to understand?

rows.label: qst701804_msg0002
rows.name:
...Yeah, I might be able to
do this! I just have to copy
the stitches, right!

rows.label: qst701804_msg0003
rows.name:
There's no need to rush, so
please try to do it carefully,
one stitch at a time.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0004
rows.name: All right, this time for sure!

rows.label: qst701804_msg0005
rows.name: I... I did it!!!!

rows.label: qst701804_msg0006
rows.name: Sata! Sata!!

rows.label: qst701804_msg0007
rows.name:
Look! Even I can do
embroidery, which I'm bad at!

rows.label: qst701804_msg0008
rows.name: So Sata, you have to smile.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0009
rows.name: Annoying.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0010
rows.name:
Yeah, I'm annoying. If you don't
say important things when you can,
you'll definitely regret it.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0011
rows.name:
There are times when it can't be helped,
but that's when you have to smile. Eventually,
you'll be able to laugh off the pain.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0012
rows.name:
...I know. It's probably
impossible to get rid of all
the painful and sad things.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0013
rows.name:
If that's the case, then
you have to find a way to
overcome them yourself.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0014
rows.name: Otherwise, you'll always be a burden.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0016
rows.name:
I'm with you, so just a
little at a time is fine.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0017
rows.name:
No matter what happens, let's
laugh it off. And then, for someone
who's having a hard time...

rows.label: qst701804_msg0018
rows.name:
We'll become adults who can
be just a little bit kind,
like Adel-sama and Laura.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0019
rows.name: If that's the case! I'll help too!

rows.label: qst701804_msg0020
rows.name:
I'm actually pretty good
at smiling, you know.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0021
rows.name:
Eh? No... I think it's fine
for now. It's not like I'm
having a hard time.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0022
rows.name: Ah... I see... right...

rows.label: qst701804_msg0023
rows.name:
Aaaah, but somehow! I feel
like smiling! Maybe!!

rows.label: qst701804_msg0024
rows.name: Really?

rows.label: qst701804_msg0025
rows.name: ...Lame.

rows.label: qst701804_msg0026
rows.name: Come on, Sata, you do it too!

rows.label: qst701804_msg0027
rows.name: Hey...

rows.label: qst701804_msg0028
rows.name: You're really cheeky, you know.
